channel.title: My 100% working barrows - UPDATED - NEW VIDEO! TONS MORE ADDED!
channel.description:
Ok guys - Updated thread, added a new video atm, I have gotten alot further, only a few minor things left to add...
New video, link below! Check it out even if you already watched old one!
[url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=1y5yc4&s=4]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=1y5yc4&s=4[/url]
Hope you enjoy!
Things left to add:
Digging Spade: DONE Working Coffin: DONE Only spawn one per run: DONE Working Stairs: DONE Working Killcount: DONE Only you can attack your npc: Not done Random Dungeon Entrance: Not done Npcs in dungeon: DONE Npcs in dungeon give killcount: DONE Working doors in dungeon: DONE Working random reward: DONE Reward gives better runes and bolt racks with more killcount: DONE Puzzles on doors to chest room: Not done Random Tunnel brother appears when you open coffin: Not done

item.title: My 100% working barrows - UPDATED - NEW VIDEO! TONS MORE ADDED!
item.dc:creator: @hah_bah_gee hah bah gee
item.description:
@hah_bah_gee wrote:

I’m back guys, went to sleep (I know most of you don’t sleep so yea, wtf was I thinking. :P) anyways, as far as some1 mentioned on the lsat page, prayer draining, agressive npc’s and npc noclipping are factors that aren’t in the server right now at all, but dont wory, within the next few days I will have them running. and 'Rich, you said that it doesn’t spawn the npc you haven’t killed, thats because I don’t have my entrance randomized, which I am working on today, it will give you different random entrances and tunnel brothers like runescape. And when you get to end, it will allow you to open the chest, but spawn your npc and you can’t loot til you kill him. Also just today I added you can only spawn 1 npc and only you can attack it… (For the better coders who won’t leech it, pm me on msn and I will let you know how I did it, incase you wanna know) Msn: hahbahgee@fagex.net

Read full topic
item.source: My 100% working barrows - UPDATED - NEW VIDEO! TONS MORE ADDED!

item.title: My 100% working barrows - UPDATED - NEW VIDEO! TONS MORE ADDED!
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:17, topic:237265”]You guys act like this is some amazing thing. It is VERY easy to do.

I was going to make something like this, but I hope you made it so it so each player uses his own heightlevel for barrows different from each other player, as if they go up the stairs, it would need to remove all of the npc’s he spawned. (Not sure if you have it cause I didn’t finish watching the video)

If I am not mistaken, “100% barrows” would have them all on the same height level, except you could only attack one, and it would only attack you.[/quote]

Yep, but for minigames such as Fight caves we us extra height levels for each player. Except for Barrows, unless you get the aggressive NPC to only only the one which spawned it, and not attack a random person inside the tomb, you may aswell just stick to heightlevels.[hr]

Noticed one thing in that video, it doesn’t spawn the extra NPC you haven’t killed when you opened the chest. Also when you open the chest, it doesn’t teleport you out, you have to run around getting hit randomoly every 15 or so seconds, until you find the correct ladder which takes you up into the tomb which you entered to get there.

Hopefully you have it so it removes the NPC you spawned once you teleport out or exit through the stairs, as you don’t want all the NPC’s they spawned and didn’t kill just grouped there.

Also a small thing, you should add a digging emote, then once it’s completed the animation, you get teleported inside.

Read full topic

item.title: My 100% working barrows - UPDATED - NEW VIDEO! TONS MORE ADDED!
item.dc:creator: @hah_bah_gee hah bah gee
item.description:
@hah_bah_gee wrote:

m.dog, I am adding that into mine, just about got it working, atm all I have left to add is:

Chest taking down Killcount: DONE
Adding them so only one can be spawned: Easy enough (Add timer)
Adding them so when you spawn only you can fight it: Medium
Fixing rest of teleport doors: DONE
Adding puzzles to 4 doors entering chest: Medium (Can some1 find me the interface ID’s?)
Spawning the npc’s in dungeon: Easy
Making the dungeon entrance Random: Hard (Atm mine is whichever you havent killed you go into thier tomb and click coffin and you get teled in.)
Making it read whichever barrows brother you havent killed spawn from chest when you open it: Medium

Read full topic

item.title: My 100% working barrows - UPDATED - NEW VIDEO! TONS MORE ADDED!
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

You guys act like this is some amazing thing. It is VERY easy to do.

`Rich:

I was going to make something like this, but I hope you made it so it so each player uses his own heightlevel for barrows different from each other player, as if they go up the stairs, it would need to remove all of the npc’s he spawned. (Not sure if you have it cause I didn’t finish watching the video)

If I am not mistaken, “100% barrows” would have them all on the same height level, except you could only attack one, and it would only attack you.

Read full topic
